Key Match Events: The OKC Thunder used a strategy to keep Victor Wembanyama in the perimeter, swarming him when he got into the paint
Post-Match Reflections: The San Antonio Spurs inched closer in the fourth quarter but the Thunder held on for a comfortable 105-93 win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Victor Wembanyama's 3-point shooting has been off to start the season, dropping from 32.5% to 22.2%
The Spurs shot 12-for-36 from deep, making Oklahoma's plan to keep the ball from Wembanyama effective
Others: Victor Wembanyama's struggles on offense were a big reason the Spurs trailed 59-44 at halftime
